title: Google Ads API
description: Source of truth for how many impressions, clicks and actions occurred in the campaign

title: Google Ad Sync Script
description: A C# function that runs from Azure Functions to grab data from Goolge on a scheduled task

title: Azure Lake Storage
description: Raw data storage for unsturctured data to be consumed by Databricks

title: Message broker
description: Microsoft Service Bus to route data from functions to storage

title: Facebook Ads API
description: Source of truth for Facebook data

title: Facebook Ad Collector App
description: A C# function that pulls the data from Facebook on a scheduled task

title: API Gateway
description: Central Data Access controller before data is released to lake storage. Common poliies such as PII scanner, malformed data formats, illegal characters, and code injections are processed here

title: Chargbee Updater
description: Custom function to pull data from databricks and update customer interactions

title: Chargebee
description: Subscription management service that bills clients
